Fascism relies on us to act as if the fascists have all the power, so that we are too scared or too disenfranchised to fight back. Have you noticed that all of Reddit acts as if a Trump Executive Order is now the law of the land, final and immutable? And yet half (or more) of what he's tried to do so far has failed to manifest. He has not been able to execute with the power he has and he's losing more of that power EVERY DAY.  I don't plan to help smooth the road for fascists. I plan to be one of ten million+ who will try anything to put speed bumps and roadbocks in front of this administration. It's up to you to decide where *you* will stand as they come barreling down the road.
Author: MommyLovesPot8toes
